short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension in the form of a pop-up notepad with various functions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome Extension in the form of a pop-up notepad with various functions.

IMPORTANT : 
Press the "Enter" key to toggle the note renaming function. Click once on any notepad and begin typing.
